SEARCH
Module net.cnoga.paint
Package net.cnoga.paint.core.bus

Class EventBus

java.lang.Object
net.cnoga.paint.core.bus.EventBus
public class EventBus extends Object
A simple event bus for program-wide reactive programming tasks.

This implementation uses reflection to discover subscriber methods annotated with SubscribeEvent in classes annotated with EventBusSubscriber.

Subscribers register listener methods for specific event types, and publishers post events that are automatically delivered to all matching subscribers.

Example usage:


 @EventBusSubscriber
 public class ToolManager {
     @SubscribeEvent
     public void onUndo(UndoRequestEvent e) {
         // handle undo
     }
 }

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static EventBus getInstance()
      Returns the shared singleton EventBus instance. Only the launcher should be aware of this.
      Returns:
      global event bus instance

    • register

      public void register(Object subscriber)
      Registers all SubscribeEvent methods of an EventBusSubscriber.

      Each annotated method must take exactly one argument.

      Parameters:
      subscriber - object containing event handler methods.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the class or methods are misannotated.

    • post

      public <T> void post(T event)
      Publishes an event to all listeners registered for its type.
      Parameters:
      event - the event to post
